cab.content: LEIuGRjiNDM - FOR THE WAR CABINET. - Viscount Milner has had under consideration; the memorandum .by Sir Eric Geddes oi 27th December, 1918, with regard to the disposal of transportation equipment in France to the French Government, and desires to suggest that the following should be added to "one authorities to he consulted as pro- posed in the last paragraph but two:- (a). - The. High Commissioners - for the self- governing Dominions. (b) The Agents General of the Australian' States. (o) ; The British South" Africa Company.SECRETCOLONIAL. OFFICE, *T February, 1919.
